mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ExpenseAmount) AS TotalExpenseAmount FROM Expense WHERE ExpenseDate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30 AND ExpenseDate < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CardID = #{cardID}

SELECT ec.description AS ExpenseCategoryDescription, COUNT(*) AS CategoryCount FROM Expense e INNER JOIN ExpenseCategory ec ON e.ExpenseCategoryCode = ec.code WHERE e.ExpenseDate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30 AND e.ExpenseDate < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND e.CardID = #{cardID} GROUP BY ec.description ORDER BY CategoryCount DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ec.description AS ExpenseCategoryDescription, SUM(e.ExpenseAmount) AS TotalAmount FROM Expense e INNER JOIN ExpenseCategory ec ON e.ExpenseCategoryCode = ec.code WHERE e.ExpenseDate >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30 AND e.ExpenseDate < TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND e.CardID = #{cardID} GROUP BY ec.description ORDER BY TotalAmount DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
